medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with 4 days of right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain that began sharply while moving out of bed. The pain was worst on the first day, persisted over the four days, has not improved, but has not worsened in severity.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic Hepatitis C, Supraventricular Tachycardia, Depression/Anxiety
